General.Name: Greenrose Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Greenrose Holding Company Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in the production and sale of cannabis products. It engages in cultivating, processing, and packaging medical cannabis and derivative products. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Amityville, New York.
